com.github.dandelion.core.option

Class AbstractOptionProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.option.AbstractOptionProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanProcessor, EmptyStringProcessor, IntegerProcessor, StringBuilderProcessor, StringProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractOptionProcessor
extends Object
implements OptionProcessor

    Abstract superclass for all Option processors.

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process(OptionProcessingContext context)
        Description copied from interface: OptionProcessor

        Processes the Entry<Option<?>, Object> contained in the passed OptionProcessingContext, using the processor associated with the Option.

        Specified by:
        process in interface OptionProcessor
        Parameters:
        context - Holder for all information needed during the option processing.

      • getProcessedValue

        protected abstract Object getProcessedValue(OptionProcessingContext context)

        Processes the Option value from the provided OptionProcessingContext and returns it.

        Parameters:
        context - The context to be used during the option processing.
        Returns:
        the processed and typed value of the option.
        Throws:
        DandelionException - if something goes wrong during the processing of the option value.

      • isBundleGraphUpdatable

        public boolean isBundleGraphUpdatable()
        Specified by:
        isBundleGraphUpdatable in interface OptionProcessor
        Returns:
        true if the option being processed can update the bundle graph, false otherwise.
